trans-unit.source: Adds supplementary information to a bookmark that enables it to access a subset of its scope handles, excluding handles that are not required.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.ExclusiveHandle"></xref> class.
Creates a list of default <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScopeHandle"></xref> objects from handle variables in the specified handle initialization context.
The environment in which the handle is created.

Adds the specified bookmark scope handle to the <xref href="System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1"></xref> of <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScopeHandle"></xref> objects using the specified context.
If this method is called after a bookmark has been created under this exclusive scope, a <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown.
The environment in which the handle is created.
The token used to identify and access a group of bookmarks that operate under the same protocol in a workflow activity operation.
Gets a new or existing <xref href="System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1"></xref> of <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScopeHandle"></xref> objects.
A read-only collection of bookmark scope handles.
Sets the registered bookmark scope handles back to the defaults.
If this method is called when there are bookmarks registered with the exclusive handle, a <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown.
The environment in which the handle is created.
